title: Vantage Data Marketplace and analytics platform integration
body:
## Overview
Facilitate data offerings, staking and data consumption on the Ocean Protocol network by empowering users with the ability to analyze any numerical data on the Ocean Protocol network and monetize their processed analytical datasets through an Ocean streamlined Analytics platform.

## Full Proposal
https://port.oceanprotocol.com/t/proposal-vantage-data-marketplace-and-analytics-platform-integration/614

## Grant Deliverables
### Phase #1 Stand up Vantage Data Marketplace
We will fork the Ocean marketplace and stand up our own decentralized marketplace @ [https://market](https://market/)(dot)vantagecrypto(dot)com.
- Fork code
- Stand up pre-production server
- Brand frontend
- Add basic integration such as marketplace menu options in CMF, option in our modular API interface to buy bulk data through the marketplace, and Vantage data filter option for example.
- Publish a subset of our data in bulk flat files
- Push out social media broadcasts, run banners on CMF and promote

We have already had one of our devs pull the marketplace code, build it and make sure they felt comfortable updating this for our branding and handful of small updates and integrations. Normally we need to design all the specifications and break down sprints before can put an accurate timeframe and cost associated to deliverables. Only because its new code to us and we haven’t properly deconstructed this as we normally would, we are setting this milestone at 1 month after funding and we anticipate total costs to complete phase 1 at around $3,600 USD.


### Engage in community conversation, questions and feedback
https://discord.com/channels/612953348487905282/776848812534398986

## Cast your vote below!
